alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 9:41AM CST until January 29 at 8:24PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam affecting Dallas, Monroe and Wilcox Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON TO MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River near Millers Ferry Dam. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon to Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 68.0 feet, Millers Ferry Park begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CST Friday the stage was 57.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 66.6 feet Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 66.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob.
